route1-n.name: Pokémart Clerk
text: Hi! I work at a Pokémon Mart. It's a convenient shop, so please visit us in VIRIDIAN CITY.
I know, I'll give you a sample! Here you go!
We also carry Poke Balls for catching Pokémon!

viridian-forest-s.before_dialouge: Hey! You have Pokémon! Come on! Let's battle'em!
viridian-forest-s.after_battling_dialouge: Ssh! You'll scare the bugs away!

viridian-forest-w.before_dialouge: Yo! You can't jam out if you're a Pokémon trainer!
viridian-forest-w.win_dialouge: Huh? I ran out of Pokémon!
viridian-forest-w.after_battling_dialouge: Darn! I'm going to catch some stronger ones!

viridian-forest-n.before_dialouge: Hey, wait up! What's the hurry?
viridian-forest-n.win_dialouge: I give! You're good at this!
viridian-forest-n.after_battling_dialouge: Sometimes, you can find stuff on the ground! I'm looking for the stuff I dropped!
